text: I've always wanted to pick up the electric guitar but didn't know where to start. Found Ethan and he taught me everything! From the type of guitar/amp etc to get, to learning chords and songs. Within a few lessons, I was able to play some songs! Ethan is incredibly patient, always explaining the theory and chords/strumming in a way I can understand. He's also able to point out many ways I can improve. The best thing is that every lesson is catered to my learning pace/style and I can tell him the songs and guitar solos I'm keen to learn and he can teach me within one lesson. He is also flexible and is not only able to cater to my work schedule, but can also conduct Zoom lessons if I'm unable to travel to his home studio. Thank you Ethan!

Ethan is an excellent teacher, he is very patient and understanding. He ensures you are able to understand the lessons and slows down when needed. He went through the basics with me thoroughly and was patient with me when I made mistakes. Thank for all the lessons bro!

Iâ€™ve had a great experience learning guitar with Ethan. In a very relaxed and fun atmosphere his teaching style has given me a new understanding of music and enjoyment for the guitar.
Thanks Ethan your a cool guitar teacher.

I ve been learning acoustic guitar from Ethan for 5 months. Seeing myself improving in theory and applying along the way is great feeling.

Thanks to Ethan indeed for his teaching experience while making learning fun and easy too.

Co-own your guitar learning journey and achieve your guitar goals with Ethan! Ethan seeks to understand your personal guitar goals and will shape his class accordingly (regardless whether you want to take grading tests or just aspire to play and sing in public one day). Classes are always casual, fun and progressive. After almost a year taking classes with Ethan, there's no better witness than my wife's ears that can ascertain to the progress I've made!
